retrieved.subject: RE: Team Meeting - Next Week
retrieved.body: Hi all, Just a reminder that we have our team meeting scheduled for next Tuesday at 2pm in the main conference room. Please review the agenda I sent earlier...

retrieved.subject: Weekly Schedule Update
retrieved.body: Please note the following schedule changes for next week: Monday - Q3 Review, Wednesday - Client presentation...

retrieved.subject: FW: Contract Renewal Notice
retrieved.body: Please be advised that the contract renewal deadline is approaching. We need to submit the signed documents by the 15th...
